Feeding my passion, my father was as crazy as I am, to the point of opening a small establishment in our neighborhood dedicated to these machines, which completes 1 year.
To celebrate, my father bought a small collection of games that, although most of them expired, that was what revenue made possible. However, a title was, luckily, quite recent.
